rules_text:
Mirage {1}{U} [i](You may cast this for {1}{U}. If you do, it's not a creature.)[/i]
Flying, vigilance
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. 
Whenever you have eight or more cards in hand, if this isn't a creature, it becomes a creature.
notes:
Needs_Art

Rank_3
I hate this statebaised whenever trigger, it is not likely to cause problems but I don't like it.
